name: Spiders (VideoGameWarlord)
description:
Standard WASD movement.

Left Mouse Button - Fire Spell

Right Mouse Button - Add to Spell

Scroll Wheel - Spell Select

Integration with PlayFab is done through a special spawner in the game. The highest number of spiders killed on the leaderboard will grant spiders from that spawner a health buff based off that number.

Assets used in the game were all free and are listed below:

Modular FP Controller : JeCase

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/modular-first-person-control...

Battle Spider : Pixel 32 Studio

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/creatures/fantasy-creature-b...

KY Magic Effects : Kakky

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/spells/ky-magic-effects-free...

Dream Forest Tree : IL.ranch

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/trees/dream-forest-tree-1052...

Fears : Devtrap

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/fears-202495
